Name: HEPH
About the game: You were awaken from the cryogenic sleep and went to check out the other crews on the ship, but ended up in the staff room and the door suddenly locked. When you try to re-create your key card to get out of the room, you found the log file and discovered the terribly truth. Your subordinate officers died. Since you get out of that room, things are getting worse and you'll have to use all of your skill to survive. About HEPH Third person survival horror game. Gathering resources; managing its capacity with the storage facilities. Craft useful items and gears with the crafting system. Customizing your weapons and armors to fight back the hostile and unfriendly situation. Use your own strategy to survive the game until the ship reaching its destination. Unlock an in-game achievements.
